= Introduction =

This guide is for editors of RO.

To become an editor, ask on the list for an ID range - it will go in this file:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/obo-relations/source/browse/trunk/src/ontology/ro-idranges.owl ro-idranges.owl]

Configure Protege4 appropriately

For more info, see:

* [http://code.google.com/p/obo-relations/source/browse/trunk/src/ontology/README-editors.txt README-editors.txt]
